overview: Karinthalakoottam is an indigenous band that propagates the music of soul to connect people with a sense of historic resolution. 18 feet symbolizes the holy distance dalits, the downtrodden, were to ensure for the sanctity of upper castes. P R Remesh, a bus conductor, is the man behind the exuberant squad that drums empathy for all in denial of historic untouchability attached to the dalit community. The troop is the vanguard in redefining the identity of people who are battered by senseless incorrectness through centuries.
title: 18 Feet
